definition: Ibuprofen or Nurofen/also called 異丁苯丙酸|异丁苯丙酸
cloth/to declare/to announce/to spread/to make known
surname Luo/old name of several rivers (in Henan, Shaanxi, Sichuan and Anhui)

sentences.english: Intravenous forms of indomethacin and ibuprofen are not available in Iran.
sentences.chinese: 伊朗目前尚无消炎痛和布洛芬的静脉制剂供应。

sentences.english: To reduce inflammation, take an aspirin or ibuprofen at mealtime.
sentences.chinese: 为了减少发炎，吃饭时候服用阿司匹林或布洛芬。

sentences.english: So be prepared to throw away your ibuprofen and crepe bandages.
sentences.chinese: 所以，准备好扔掉你的布洛芬或是弹力绷带。

sentences.english: I did finally finish Infinite Jest! And the whole thing required only three bottles of Advil.
sentences.chinese: 我读完了《无穷尽的笑话》，只需要三瓶雅维布洛芬。

sentences.english: Ferrous sulfate and ibuprofen are prescribed for pain.
sentences.chinese: 如果腹痛服用硫酸亚铁和布洛芬。

sentences.english: Her medication list included a daily oral contraceptive pill and ibuprofen as needed.
sentences.chinese: 药物史为服口服避孕药和布洛芬。
还包括布洛芬和双氯芬酸。

sentences.english: Objective To study the interaction of the ibuprofen enantiomers during the chiral inversion.
sentences.chinese: 目的研究布洛芬离体肝代谢中对映体之间的相互作用。

sentences.english: OBJECTIVE To investigate the major metabolites of eugenol ibuprofen ester propionic acid.
sentences.chinese: 目的研究鉴定丁香酚布洛芬酯在大鼠体内的代谢行为。

sentences.english: Ibuprofen is not included in any OTD drug monograph.
sentences.chinese: 没有任何一个OTD专著包括布洛芬。

sentences.english: This required three full days and one bottle of Advil.
sentences.chinese: 这需要三个整天和一瓶雅维布洛芬。

sentences.english: Acetaminophen or ibuprofen taken by mouth is commonly used to control fever and other symptoms.
sentences.chinese: 通常口服乙酰氨基酚或布洛芬来控制发烧等症状。

sentences.english: Now he had to make do with ibuprofen and fortitude.
sentences.chinese: 现在他必须靠布洛芬和坚韧的意志来对抗它。

sentences.english: Over-the-counter pain relievers, such as ibuprofen, also may help.
sentences.chinese: 到医院拿药如布洛芬可能会有效果。

sentences.english: In the short term, taking medicine such as ibuprofen is a good way to reduce the inflammation.
sentences.chinese: 短期内，服用布洛芬之类的药是很好消炎的方法。

pinyin: dui4 yi3 xian1 an1 ji1 fen1

definition: antipyretic (drug to reduce fever, such as sulfanilamide)
diclofenac sodium, a non-steroidal anti-inflammatory drug used to reduce swelling and as painkiller/also called voltaren 扶他林
aspirin (loanword) (variant of 阿司匹林[a1 si1 pi3 lin2])
